page.title: 01Twyford & Poundon Landscape
page.content: Our block is a rural area.The main village is{Twyford}population 550 { ,Poundon}90 people and small hamlet of{Godington.}The land is used for mixed farming i.e.animals and cereals.The dominating skyline feature is{Calvert Brickworks chimneys}just out of our block.The area's accomodation is attracting an increasing number of people who work in nearby towns and cities.A few people work as far away as London or worldwide.We think our area is a pleasant place to live with no particular social problems,little noise or heavy traffic i.e. no airport,motorway or heavy industry other than the brickworks which is not noisy but does cause some air pollution from time to time.It is a place where young and old can walk without fear for their safety.
